TopicTitle: Do Not Taunt the Magic Boulder!

Articles.Content: Do not mine from the magic boulder.
Do not hide from magic boulder

Do not touch the operational end of the Boulder. Do not look directly at the operational end of the Boulder. Do not submerge the Boulder in liquid, even partially. Most importantly, under no circumstances should youu.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-01-01T02:40:25Z" title="01/01/2018 02:40  AM" data-short="6 yr">January 1, 2018</time> by cubinator**

You may touch the green Magic Boulder, but whatever you do...don’t touch the red Magic Boulder, because ~~that will set off the bomb immediately and we’ll all be dead~~ you will likely be transported to Tekto and never return.
do not bomb magi boulder

Do not sneeze in front of the Magic Boulder when at a distance less than 768.34795 meters

**Edited <time datetime="2018-01-01T19:03:24Z" title="01/01/2018 07:03  PM" data-short="6 yr">January 1, 2018</time> by Earthlinger**
Do not rotate the Magic Boulder about the Z axis during periods of high solar activity.
Do not evacuate all KSP personell to the magic boulder ~~unless everyone will die and KSP will get bankrupt from all that beuracracy.~~
Do not attach your vessel to the magic boulder.
Do not dock two vessels within a radius of 31.41592653589793238462643383279502884197169km to the Magic Boulder
Do not fall for the magic boulder, then realize that she's ~~too young~~ already taken.
if magic boulder changes colors at intervals less than once per minute, please return and compare genetics test results to prior test.

Most importantly do NOT (REDACTED) to the magic boulder.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-01-08T16:24:20Z" title="01/08/2018 04:24  PM" data-short="6 yr">January 8, 2018</time> by Dfthu**

Do not ingest or directly contact Magic Boulder

Doing so may cause **HIGHLY EXPLOSIVE diarrhea**
Do not talk to the boulder when under the influence.
Do not consume psychoactive drugs during proximity to the Magic Boulder.
Do not eat the Magic Boulder.

Don't poke the Boulder with a LV-N "Nerv" Atomic Rocket Motor

And, yes, I did that word-for-word. Look it up.

> Wait... did you get that from where I think you got that?

Yes, I got that were you think I got it.
Do not anger a pink or red Magic Boulder by dropping popcorn crumbs on it. Other Boulders may not mind.
Do not Magic Boulder the Magic Boulder.
Do not touch Boulders with anything , especially if they’re yellow, in the Kerbal Badlands. #EmikoStation
Do not change the magic boulders color, unless you want to wreck all physics and make all scientists go crazy
